title: Video: Vondelpark – Dracula
body:
**[Vondelpark](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18282-new-vondelpark-dracula/ "New: Vondelpark – Dracula")**, in essence are a series of fragments, glimmers of youthful poignancy amongst a sea of distain and uncertainty. _Dracula_, the debut single from their 2013 **R&S** album _Seabed_, was their most accomplished tune to date. It all finally made sense. The sadness made sense, if that makes sense. The video is just as good, again we’re offered a sea of fragmented memories from, ‘that night’, or ‘those night’, almost just nights in general. **Vondelpark** have lived them and they’re sharing the parts they can remember.

_Seabed_ drops in February via R&S.
